Class DVLA

java.lang.Object
DVLA
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class DVLA extends Object implements Serializable
The DVLA class represents a serializable object that models a Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency. It maintains information about car registrations, keepers, and provides functionality for managing and retrieving relevant data. Implements the Serializable interface to support object serialization.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    Constructors
    Constructor

    DVLA()
    Constructs a new DVLA object with empty registration and keeper information maps.

      public void saveWarningReminderDataToFlashDrive(String filename, Map<RegNo,Keeper> warningData, Map<RegNo,Keeper> reminderData)
      Saves warning and reminder data to a flash drive with the specified filename.
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the file to save the data to.
      warningData - The map containing warning data.
      reminderData - The map containing reminder data.

    • readWarningReminderDataFromFlashDrive

      public static Map<String,Map<RegNo,Keeper>> readWarningReminderDataFromFlashDrive(String filename)
      Reads warning and reminder data from a flash drive with the specified filename.
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the file to read the data from.
      Returns:
      A map containing warning and reminder data, or null if an error occurs.

    • getTaxExpirationReminderList

      public Map<RegNo,Keeper> getTaxExpirationReminderList(Month month)
      Retrieves a list of keepers for tax expiration reminder in the specified month.
      Parameters:
      month - The month for which the tax expiration reminder is requested.
      Returns:
      A map of registration numbers to keepers for tax expiration reminder.

    • printLetters

      public void printLetters(Map<RegNo,Keeper> letterList, Month month)
      Helper method to print registration numbers and keepers from a given letter list.
      Parameters:
      letterList - A Map containing registration numbers and corresponding keepers.
      month - The month for which the letters are printed.

    • saveDataToFlashDrive

      Saves DVLA data to a flash drive with the specified filename.
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the file to save the data to.

    • readDataFromFlashDrive

      public static DVLA readDataFromFlashDrive(String filename)
      Reads DVLA data from a flash drive with the specified filename.
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the file to read the data from.
      Returns:
      The DVLA object read from the flash drive, or null if an error occurs.
